components.name: ovhcloud
components.description: Discovers scrape targets from OVHcloud servers

examples.title: Discover OVHcloud servers
examples.description: Discover dedicated servers in OVHcloud
examples.code:
discovery.ovhcloud "servers" {
  service = "dedicated_server"
  application_key = env("OVH_APPLICATION_KEY")
  application_secret = env("OVH_APPLICATION_SECRET")
  consumer_key = env("OVH_CONSUMER_KEY")
  refresh_interval = "5m"
}

components.name: scaleway
components.description: Discovers scrape targets from Scaleway instances

examples.title: Discover Scaleway instances
examples.description: Discover instances in Scaleway cloud
examples.code:
discovery.scaleway "instances" {
  role = "instance"
  project_id = "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"
  secret_key = env("SCALEWAY_SECRET_KEY")
  zone = "fr-par-1"
  refresh_interval = "5m"
}

components.description: Discovers scrape targets from Joyent Triton containers

examples.title: Discover Triton containers
examples.description: Discover containers in Joyent Triton
examples.code:
discovery.triton "containers" {
  account = "example"
  dns_suffix = "triton.zone"
  endpoint = "https://us-east-1.api.joyent.com"
  role = "container"
  refresh_interval = "1m"
}
